teacher_info.intro:
大家好，我是何老师
毕业于英国斯特灵大学英语教学专业，
积累了扎实的语言教育理论，了解学生在学习第二语言时的心理和方法。
Hi, I'm Holly, graduated at University of Stirling, majoring in TESOL. 
At my student time, what I got is a huge mount of language teaching theory and second language learning psychology and methods.

Hey, I am Dora. I have nearly 8 years of teaching experience and I am open to teach students of intermediate to high level Chinese proficiency. 
I like Travelling, I have been to many wonderful places over the world. I love experiencing the different cultures. 
I have been teaching online for years with over 3 years now. I have had thousands of classes with the students from different countries with different levels and abilities. You can choose any topic in the class. I'll quickly see out your level during the conversation, and you will learn and having fun in my classes!
 I can speak standard Mandarin, and quite fluent English to communicate and teach.

This is Sherin. I am from China， and now I‘m living in Malta.

我是Sherin,来自中国，现在在马耳他居住。因为我生在中国的北方城市，所以我的普通话发音非常标准。

Hello, I am Ann. A professional Chinese teacher graduated with a major and a certificate in TCSOL (Teaching Chinese to speakers of other languages). I have been teaching Chinese for more than 3 years. In 2019, I started my teaching in Europe. During my working there, I have met students from different age groups and cultures, which allowed me to further practice my teaching skills and made me more confident in Chinese teaching. I am a great listener who you can feel comfortable to practice your Chinese with me. 
你好，很高兴认识你，我是林老师。我有超过两年的汉语教学经验，在课堂上希望你多说，多练习。无论你处在汉语的什么水平，我都希望尽我所能得帮助到你。期待与你见面！
I was born in Harbin, China. Very standard Chinese is spoken in the beautiful city of Harbin. I graduated from a teacher's college and hold a professional teacher qualification certificate.

I'm Qiuqiu, a graduate student from China. I studied Japanese when I was in University. I like photography, like food, like traveling, also like pets. I'm good at listening and patient. Welcome to learn Chinese with me~（I don't have much open time, so if you want to make an appointment，you can contact me directly^^）

きゅうきゅうと申します!中国出身です。今大学院２年生です。大学時代には四年間日本語を勉強していました。日本語で教えることができます。私と一緒に楽しく中国を勉強しましょう~!(レッスンの時間について、気に入る時間がないなら、遠慮なく連絡してくださいね。時間をオープンしてあげますから^^)

I’m a native speaker of Mandarin and Cantonese.
I've been teaching Chinese for about 4 years, and have taught in Malaysia, Cambodia. 
My qualifications include National Teaching Certificate of teaching Chinese in Senior School, 
Certificate for Teachers of Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages （by Confucius Institute Headquarters）, 
and Teaching Diploma in Chinese Language and Literature.
I have taught students from all over the world. 
No matter you're a Beginner or Advanced level, or you want to pass the HSK exam, I can help you to achieve your goal. 
I like to share ideas with my friends, including artist, music, history, in order to learn how to look a question in different ways.

Hello,everyone! My name is Li Shutian. 
I'm from China. Chinese is my first language.
I'm a teacher. I teach English and Chinese. I love teaching and learning languages. Because it helps me to communicate with more people and know more about the world. 

I live in China now and I like travelling very much. China is a very beautiful country, if you want to visit China,please call me, and I can be your guide.

Hi, I am Wen. I am a native Mandarin Chinese speaker. I can speak fluent English and a little bit of French. I like reading, writing, dancing and drawing. I have a master's degree in Sociology in the University of Edinburgh and a bachelor's degree in Finance in China.

I am currently pursuing a Master of Education in the UK. As a professional teacher with many years of experience, I create tailored lessons for each of my students. I am very patient and provide a stress-free learning environment where mistakes are always welcome.
I will help you excel at reading, writing, and speaking through exercises that focus on both grammar and pronunciation.Furthermore, I offer a variety of teaching methods, such as debates, in order to 
challenge your limitations. 
In summary, my lessons provide a stage to express your ideas about the world in Chinese.

I have a two year working experience in teaching Chinese at the Confucius Institute at the University of Ghana, Legon where I taught Comprehensive Chinese courses, HSK Tutoring courses, and Business Chinese class Tourism Chinese class and Happy Chinese class.But, apart from the aforementioned, I also enjoyed certain tasks such as directing my students in Chinese Cultural and Performing arts.I had a wonderful time teaching in Ghana since, I saw significant improvements in the level of my students who now basically speak, write and read Chinese daily without difficulty. This was particularly evident when many students of mine passed the HSK and HSKK exams with ease.

大家好，我的名字是汤姆，我是中国人，我来自中国。我的母语是中文的粤语和普通话。我在italki学习英语和西班牙语快两年了。如果你想学中文(普通话或粤语)，我会帮到你。
         Hello, my name is Tom, I am Chinese and I am from China.  I am a native of Chinese (Cantonese and Mandarin.) I have learned English and Spanish in italki for almost two years.  If you want to learn Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese), I will help you
          Hola,  me llamo Tom,  soy chino y soy de  China . yo soy  a nativo de chino ( cantonés y mandarín.) He  aprendido inglés y español en italki por casi dos años. Si quieres aprender chino ( mandarín o cantonés), te ayudaré

Hi guys, my name is Tina. I am a full-time Mandarin teacher who’s currently living in South Korea. I can speak English, Chinese and fluent Korean. After completing my MA degree on Teaching Chinese as second language, I have been teaching Mandarin at universities both in China and South Korea. During those 6 years of teaching Mandarin at school setting, I have taught different Chinese subjects including General Chinese, Busines Chinese, Character writing and recognizing, HSK Preparing and others. 
If you are trying to find a teacher who can help you with your Chinese studies, I’m pretty confident that I that I can guide you based on your own learning needs.

Hi, everyone! :D
I'm Junjun. I'd appreciate it if you could watch my intro video before booking a lesson.
And I will study for a Master's degree( Masters of Translation and Interpreting) in Sep. 2021.

Update on March 22, 2021:
Dear students and friends,
If you have taken 20 or more lessons before April, 2021, 
you are welcome to choose type-OLD STUDENTS ONLY !
Thanks for your support! :D

Best Regards,
Junjun

大家好！我是梵，我是一名汉语母语者，我喜欢阅读、旅行和写作，了解不同的文化。我拥有行政管理和德语言文学的本科双学位，并在2018年获得了人类学硕士学位，我从2018年开始在Italki教授汉语，现在是一名全职汉语老师。I am Fanny. I am a native Chinese speaker. I hold a double Bachelor degree of Administration and German literature, and a Master degree of Anthropology. My hobby includes literature, travelling, writing, translating poems and learning languages. I really like to explore the different beauties in different languages, and want to share my love for Chinese with you.

Hello, my name is Sean. I am glad to have the opportunity to meet you and introduce myself here.
I am from China, a native Chinese speaker, and I am a professional international Chinese language teacher. I am currently teaching Chinese at a university in Slovakia. I studied English as an undergraduate major, and an international education major in Chinese as a master. I have more than 4 years of professional teaching experience. My students come from all over the world. So I am very good at making friends with people from different cultural circles, communicating and learning from each other. I love to travel, taste different styles of food, and experience local customs.

Hi, I'm Rui. I'm currently a Chinese teacher. I have two master's degrees which are Master's degree in Teaching Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages in Beijing Normal University and M.A. in Teaching in Western Kentucky University. I taught Chinese in the U.S for two years. So if you are an English speaker, I would be the perfect Chinese teacher for you. I got my Certificate for Teachers of Chinese to Speakers of Other Languages in 2018, and Kentucky Standard Teaching Certificate (Chinese) this year. I love teaching and learning languages, which allow me to explore a bigger world. I also like working out and traveling. I cannot wait to meet you!

My name's Luyang(露阳) and I'm an enthusiastic, interesting and creative individual with a wide-spanning of interests. First of all, I love learning about other cultures, places in the world and staying up to date with current affairs. There is no topic that I don't enjoy talking about. Secondly, I enjoy traveling and exploring new places with my families and friends as well as taking pictures and making videos along the way to capture the precious moments. Thirdly, I find that there is nothing better in the world than learning new things. Currently, I'm learning French and Python. Hopefully, I will be fluent in a third language and could build my own website.

Hi there, welcome! How wonderful it is to be able to communicate in the world's most spoken language? I'm Lili, here to help you learn Mandarin Chinese. I'm native Chinese teacher and currently live in the Netherlands. I'm passionate about languages. Having learned 4 foreign languages myself, I'm able to relate to you when it comes to studying languages. I can explain things clearly and make it easier for you to understand and remember. Wish to discuss Chinese culture too? No problem! Always happy to hear about students' stories and what they think about mandarin and China in general. Have you been to China already? Wonderful, then we have more to discuss:-)
Looking forward to meeting you!

Hello everyone !I am Peggy！I am from Beijing, now  I am studying postgraduate in Ireland. I am an enthusiastic, optimistic and cheerful person. My most significant advantage is that I have great patience, and I am a responsible person. I like reading, watching brain-burning movies and documentaries. My favourite sports are roller skating, skiing and swimming.   I  am really into travelling， I travelled several countries（ Cuba, Italy, France, Morocco, Russia, Nepal, India, Sri Lanka, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Australia, United Kingdom, Ireland, UAE, etc...）. I hope to explore more places! I also like making friends. Let's be friends!
